name: Electric Scubaloo
description:
Created by: Graham Wiebe & James Gudge

Electric Scubaloo is a competitive 2 Player underwater fight for Treasure.

Players try to collect the most treasure in the time limit while trying not to drown underwater.

THIS GAME WAS MADE DURING THE WINNIPEG GAME JAM IN 2 1/2 DAYS

------Controls------

--Winnitron--

Joystick - Rotate/Aim Character

Primary Button - Swim

Secondary Button - Fire/Retract Harpoon

Home - Back to main menu / Quit App

--360 Gamepad--

Left Analogue Stick - Rotate/Aim Character

A/X - Swim

B/Y - Fire/Retract Harpoon

ESC - Back to main menu / Quit App
